## Where to find code and data

* Course book: "R Bioinformatics Cookbook" by Dan McLean
* Github repository: <https://github.com/PacktPublishing/R-Bioinformatics-Cookbook>
* Datasets: <https://github.com/PacktPublishing/R-Bioinformatics-Cookbook/tree/master/datasets>

## Needed R Packges

* dplyr: "Data pliers": general R package for processing data frames
* readr: R package for fast and flexible import of data
